news.content:
‚è∞ ThreeFold Community Call


We'd like to invite the community to a call next Tuesday April 19 at 5pm CET. We'll provide a general update and answer questions. üôè See you there!


  • Call Link here
  • Submit questions ahead of time here
news.excerpt: We'd like to invite the community for a call to catch up on all things ThreeFold next Tuesday April 19th.
